data.displayName: Standing Offer: Fixed Rate Small Business

fees.description: Membership of $25. per month (inc. GST) to access these fixed rates.
Standard Connection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
Standard Disconnection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
An $3 (inc. GST) fee applies if payment is dishonoured or reversed.
A $16 (inc. GST) fee applies if full payment has not been received by the invoice due date.
A fee of 1% applies to payments made by credit or debit card

electricityContract.terms: For full terms and conditions, visit https://www.amber.com.au/terms.
electricityContract.variation: This is a fixed tariff. You will not get access to the wholesale rate.

eligibility.information: Available to small business customers in United Energy's distribution region. For illustrative purposes, tariff LVM1R assumed. Feed-In Tariffs are only valid if applicable

solarFeedInTariff.description: Solar FiT c/kWh exported (incl. GST if applicable)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: No lock in contracts or exit fees.
